text.__SUMMARY__: Common names: red carpet viper, Kenyan carpet viper.Echis pyramidum aliaborri is a venomous viper subspecies endemic to northern Kenya.
text.Description: It is distinguished from other subspecies of E. pyramidum by its relatively large supraocular scales and characteristic red-orange color.
text.Geographic range: It is found only in northern Kenya.The type locality is described as "approximately 8 km north of Wajir Town, Wajir District, Kenya".
